content:
Diagnosis:
Locally advanced esophageal adenocarcinoma T3N1M0

Histology:
Moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma of lower esophagus
HER2 negative
PDL1 CPS 10

Previous treatment:
Completed neoadjuvant FLOT chemotherapy March-July 2024
Partial response on interval imaging

Current situation:
Post-operative recovery following Ivor Lewis esophagectomy 15 August 2024

Trial Registration:
Successfully screened for the AEGIS trial (Phase III randomized controlled trial of adjuvant immunotherapy versus observation in patients with resected esophageal adenocarcinoma)

Baseline assessments completed including:
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis 1 September 2024 - no evidence of residual or metastatic disease
ECG - normal sinus rhythm
Bloods including thyroid function, cortisol, and autoimmune screen all within normal range

Trial participation:
Randomized to treatment arm
First dose of trial medication (durvalumab) scheduled for 15 September 2024
Trial-specific toxicity monitoring and QoL assessments completed
Provided with trial emergency card and 24-hour contact numbers

Follow up plan:
Weekly review for first 4 weeks of trial treatment
Trial-specific imaging at 12 weeks
Regular MDT discussion as per protocol

I have discussed the trial protocol in detail with [redacted name] including the requirement for regular blood tests and imaging. We have reviewed potential side effects of immunotherapy and provided written information about managing immune-related adverse events. [redacted name] demonstrates good understanding of the trial requirements and has provided written informed consent.

cancer_timeline.value: Completed neoadjuvant FLOT chemotherapy with partial response
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis shows no evidence of residual or metastatic disease
Successfully screened and randomized to treatment arm of AEGIS trial

patient_facts.value: Normal thyroid function, cortisol, and autoimmune screen

status_updates.value: Locally advanced esophageal adenocarcinoma post neoadjuvant chemotherapy and surgery, now enrolled in adjuvant immunotherapy trial
Randomized to treatment arm of AEGIS trial, durvalumab to commence 15 September 2024
Weekly review for first 4 weeks of trial treatment
